Wisdom: اجْعَلِ الدِّينَ كَهْفَكَ وَالْعَدْلَ سَيْفَكَ تَنْجُ مِنْ كُلِّ سُوءٍ وَتَظْفَرْ عَلَى كُلِّ عَدُوٍّ
enWisdom: Make the religion your refuge and justice your sword, [then] you will be safe from every evil and will triumph over every foe
The fruit of religion is trustworthiness
One whose religiousness is sound, his trustworthiness is stronger

Wisdom: مَنْ دَقَّ فِي الدِّينِ نَظَرُهُ جَلَّ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ خَطَرُهُ
enWisdom: One whose observance of religion is thorough, his position in the Hereafter will be exalted
